entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 5 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 26 overnight. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 14 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: A few flurries. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Flurries. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 15 in the evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 6:34 PM EST Wednesday 22 February 2023
